revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C7 |revision=v3.x |series=AC1750 |asin=B00CEB53MS;US; |fcc_date=03/03/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C7V3 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FV |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N;AR8327N-BL1A; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^TP-LINK_2.4GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$,,, ^TP-LINK_5GHz_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=2872&model=Archer+C7 Product page]{{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/Archer%20C7_2.0/ Firmware Interface]{{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=Archer+C7&version=V3 Downloads]{{•}} [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/document/Archer_C7_V2_User_Guide_1910010809.pdf User Guide]
"2050500491" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"2052500481" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
The firmware is shared between v2 and v3, presumably the hardware is very similar.
==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32498-tp-link-archer-c7-v2-reviewed Review on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
